headline: Pertamina and Halliburton Sign an Integrated Unconventional Fracturing MOU in Indonesia
summary: HOUSTON, February 22, 2026--PT Pertamina (Persero), Indonesia’s state-owned integrated energy company, and Halliburton (NYSE: HAL), a global leader in energy services and technology, signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to accelerate the deployment of advanced well construction and stimulation technologies in Indonesia. Under this MOU, Pertamina and Halliburton intend to evaluate opportunities for multi-stage hydraulic fracturing, acid stimulation, advanced cementing services, as well as t
